item.title: The US core PCE price index for July recorded a 2.9% year-on-year increase, in line with expectations.
item.description: On August 29th, the year-on-year rate of the US July Core PCE Price Index was 2.9%, reaching a new high since February 2025. The expected value was 2.90%, with a previous value of 2.80%. (FX168)

item.title: Point of View: Ethereum Price Action Shows Weakness But Has Not Peaked Yet, Merely in a Seasonal Trend
item.description: On August 29th, trader CoinMamba made a post stating, "The market appears to be a bit weak. However, when I took another look at the ETH chart, in my view, we have not yet reached the peak. We are merely going through a normal seasonal trend."BlockBeats had previously reported that on August 26th, Matrixport said, "Most of the institutional funds during summer have exited. But Ethereum continues to attract inflows, while Bitcoin ETF may experience net outflows for the fifth consecutive month. The outflow this month is estimated to be around $1.2 billion, which is the second-highest in history, only next to February's $3.5 billion. Seasonal factors may be temporary, but they remind us that fund flows are as important as seasonality. After maintaining a bullish stance in July, we became cautious in August. Although macro and liquidity factors may still support Bitcoin, the current market still needs to remain vigilant."

item.title: The Federal Reserve maintains neutrality regarding Trump's attempt to dismiss Powell, only urging the judge to make a prompt ruling.
item.description: On August 29th, a Politico reporter stated that the Federal Reserve had no stance on Trump's attempt to fire Lise Kudlow. It only requested the judge to issue a ruling as soon as possible and pledged to abide by that ruling. (Xinhua News)

item.title: Aave-backed Horizon RWA Market Launches with Nearly $50 Million TVL on First Day
item.description: On August 29th, according to Sentora, on the very first day of the market launch of Aave-backed Horizon RWA, the TVL neared nearly $50 million. And more than $5 million had already been borrowed based on tokenized government bonds and CLOs.

item.title: Analysis: Bitcoin Faces Increasing Pressure Below Key Support
item.description: August 29th: After reaching a brand new all-time high of more than $124,500, Bitcoin remains in a retracement phase and is currently fluctuating around $110,000. Glassnode's weekly report indicated that as the cost basis of investors over the past six months came under pressure, major buyers are experiencing increasing anxiety. The company stated: "Consequently, any relief rally may encounter resistance because short-term holders are inclined to sell at break-even points."The asset's price has fallen below the 1-month and 3-month realized prices, which are currently $115,300 and $113,700 respectively. However, the 6-month realized price ($107,440) is acting as a crucial support level. The so-called "realized price" refers to the average purchase price of coins within a specific time frame and is used to gain insights into investors' positions and market sentiment.CoinDesk Research also pointed out that the realized price for short-term holders is above $108,500, a level from which

item.title: Asseto collaborates with CMS to attend the BNB Chain Fifth Anniversary Celebration, jointly promoting the integration of TradFi and Web3
item.description: August 29th. During the BNB Chain fifth-anniversary celebration held in Hong Kong today, CZ, the founder of BNB Chain, delivered a speech, highlighting that user adoption, institutional trust, and compliance architecture will be the core driving forces for the next-stage growth of the blockchain.It is worth noting that Gary Zhou, CEO of CMS Asset Management (HK), and Bridget Li, co-founder and CEO of Asseto, appeared on the same stage for the first time. They discussed how institutional-grade financial products can enter the Web3 ecosystem through tokenization. This marks a significant milestone in the deep integration of traditional finance and the crypto-native world.Asseto showcased its core product - CASH+, which is the first derivative token of an Asian asset management USD money market fund issued on the BNB Chain. The underlying assets are managed by CMS and have already been accepted as eligible collateral by multiple DeFi protocols. The joint appearance of CMS and Asseto w

item.title: Crypto KOL 0xsun spent 30 ETH to purchase 807,301 Block coins.
item.description: On August 29th, as per the monitoring of LookOnChain, Smart Money and crypto KOL 0xsun spent 30 ETH (approximately $13.38 million) to purchase 807,301 Block tokens today. Previously, 0xSun had achieved a profit of over $24 million with TRUMP.Earlier, 0xsun posted on social media, stating, "WLFI is about to open. After examining the on-chain WLFI/USD1 concept and discussing this topic with a few friends a few days ago, I chose to buy BlockStreet first. Founder Matthew Morgan is not only an advisor to WLFI, responsible for partnerships and marketing, but also serves as the Chief Investment Officer of WLFI's coin stock company ALT5.BlockStreet happens to be an incubator and launchpad for the WLFI/USD1 ecosystem, and Matt's position can offer a significant advantage, making it a good entry point."

item.title: OVERTAKE will launch a "Transaction Activity" aimed at rewarding TAKE holders who participate in staking and trading.
item.description: August 29th. As per official information, the game asset trading platform OVERTAKE is set to launch a "Trading Event" to offer rewards to participating TAKE holders who stake and trade. The event commencement time is 10:00 AM (UTC) on August 29th, 2025.Users are required to stake TAKE in order to participate in this event. The trading event is based on the buy + sell volume on PancakeSwap, and the rankings are determined by the total USD trading volume. The event will distribute 100,000 TAKE each week, and the top 100 traders will receive the same reward. The rewards will be sent to the staked Sui wallet within 7 days after the end of each week.The officials declared that this trading event is intended to strengthen the TAKE ecosystem on PancakeSwap, reward loyal community members who participate in staking and trading, and enhance the inclusivity of rewards by evenly distributing rewards among hundreds of participants.

item.title: Ethereum Withdrawal Trend Continues, with CEX Net Outflow of 134,900 ETH in the Past 24 Hours
item.description: On August 29th, according to Coinglass data, within the past 24 hours, the total net outflow of ETH from CEXs was 134,900 ETH. The top three exchanges with the largest outflows are as follows:· Binance, with an outflow of 113,700 ETH;· Bybit, with an outflow of 27,800 ETH;· Bithumb, with an outflow of 3,123.70 ETH.In addition, OKX witnessed an inflow of 5,594.47 ETH and ranked first in the inflow list.

item.title: Influencer @0xSunNFT spent 30 $ETH($133.8K) to buy 807,301 $Block today.
item.description: Influencer @0xSunNFT spent 30 $ETH($133.8K) to buy 807,301 $Block today. 0xSun once made over $24M in profit from $TRUMP.
